00022 #ifndef ConstDoubleTab_parts_included
00023 #define ConstDoubleTab_parts_included
00024 
00025 #include <DoubleTabs.h>
00026 #include <Vect_IntTab.h>
00027 
00028 //
00029 //
00030 //
00031 //! This class allows to acces to individual sub-parts of const DoubleTab<br>objects that have a MD_Vector_composite descriptor. It is designed<br>to preserve the const-ness of the object.
00032 class ConstDoubleTab_parts
00033 {
00034 public:
00035   ConstDoubleTab_parts() {};
00036   ConstDoubleTab_parts(const DoubleVect&);
00037   void initialize(const DoubleVect&);
00038   void reset();
00039   const DoubleTab& operator[](int i) const
00040   {
00041     return parts_[i];
00042   }
00043   int size() const
00044   {
00045     return parts_.size();
00046   }
00047 private:
00048 // Interdit (voir commentaires dans .cpp)
00049   ConstDoubleTab_parts& operator=(const ConstDoubleTab_parts&);
00050   ConstDoubleTab_parts(const ConstDoubleTab_parts&);
00051 // parts_[i] is initialized by adopter() to point to a sub_part of
00052 // the source array.
00053   VECT(DoubleTab) parts_;
00054 };
00055 
00056 class DoubleTab_parts
00057 {
00058 public:
00059   DoubleTab_parts() {};
00060   DoubleTab_parts(DoubleVect&);
00061   void initialize(DoubleVect&);
00062   void reset();
00063 // operator[] est non const sinon on pourrait contourner le
00064 // l'attribut const d'une classe...
00065   DoubleTab& operator[](int i)
00066   {
00067     return parts_[i];
00068   }
00069 // En revanche, on a toujours le doit d'avoir la version const:
00070   const DoubleTab& operator[](int i) const
00071   {
00072     return parts_[i];
00073   }
00074   int size() const
00075   {
00076     return parts_.size();
00077   }
00078 private:
00079 // Interdit (voir commentaires dans .cpp)
00080 // note: ca serait interdit meme si le parametre n'est pas const !!!
00081   DoubleTab_parts& operator=(const DoubleTab_parts&);
00082   DoubleTab_parts(const DoubleTab_parts&);
00083 // parts_[i] is initialized by adopter() to point to a sub_part of
00084 // the source array.
00085   VECT(DoubleTab) parts_;
00086 };
